name: Verification of posting reply during Quote or Policy Creation

testSteps.description: 1: Verification of posting reply during Quote or Policy Creation ({Title=New Note1, Type=Activity Note, Memo=Test Memo1, Memo1=Memo})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create quote
And with program name is 'Amazon'
Then underwriter creates quote successfully
Given underwriter is on home page
When underwriter opens newly created 'quote'
When underwriter navigates to Notes
And select the Adds New Note
And with Title as 'New Note1'
And select with Type as 'Activity Note'
And with Memo as 'Test Memo1' and click on ok button
And select the Adds Post Reply
And with Memo in post reply as 'Memo' and click on ok button
Then Note should be attached to the quote as 'New Note1'
And Last Memo should be populated as 'Memo'

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given underwriter is on home page
When underwriter opens newly created 'quote'
When underwriter navigates to Notes
And select the Adds New Note
And with Title as '<Title>'
And select with Type as '<Type>'
And with Memo as '<Memo>' and click on ok button
And select the Adds Post Reply
And with Memo in post reply as '<Memo1>' and click on ok button
Then Note should be attached to the quote as '<Title>'
And Last Memo should be populated as '<Memo1>'
